name: EXMR FDN
description:
EXMR aims to create a world-class crypto payment gateway, alongside other services, for the crypto community. GetCryptoPayments.com aspires to create 'an open, safe, and fair financial ecosystem' for crypto holders.

- Official website: (https://exmrfoundation.org)
